selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer for output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the final count of birth years greater than 1945.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_birth_years_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract a list of birth years from the provided image.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A list of birth years extracted from the image.
edge_cases: Image is blurry or contains unclear text.
Birth years are not in a recognizable format.

new_skill_specs.name: count_years_after_1945
new_skill_specs.purpose: Count the number of birth years that are greater than 1945.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The count of birth years greater than 1945.
